message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start us off.
Let's switch the roles, Alice.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. After all, I'm the one who rejected your offer!
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm taking a hit from inflation here.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split. Take it or leave it.
Alice, I'm getting impatient. Inflation is biting into your share, but I'm sticking to my guns. This time, it's 70/30, or we keep playing. Your call.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a 50/50 split. Let's end this now before inflation eats away at everything!
Alice, the clock is ticking. Inflation is eating away at your share, and I'm feeling generous. This time, it's 80/20. Take it or leave it, but I won't be making any more concessions.
